mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_INFO ( NAME, SCHOOL_NAME, BASE_SCORE, RANK_SCORE, CHANCE_1, CHANCE_2, CHANCE_3, CHANCE_4, CHANCE_5, CHANCE_6, TEAM_CODE, TEAM_SLOGAN ) VALUES ( #{teamName} , #{schoolName} , IFNULL(#{teamBaseScore},0) , IFNULL(#{teamRankScore},0) , IFNULL(#{chance1},0) , IFNULL(#{chance2},0) , IFNULL(#{chance3},0) , IFNULL(#{chance4},0) , IFNULL(#{chance5},0) , IFNULL(#{chance6},0) , #{teamCode} , #{teamGroupName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TEAM_INFO SET BASE_SCORE = BASE_SCORE - #{quizInfoScore}, RANK_SCORE = RANK_SCORE -#{quizInfoScore} WHERE SEQ = #{teamSeq}

UPDATE TEAM_INFO SET NAME = #{teamName}, SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolName}, BASE_SCORE = IFNULL(#{teamBaseScore},0), RANK_SCORE = IFNULL(#{teamRankScore},0), CHANCE_1 = #{chance1}, CHANCE_2 = #{chance2}, CHANCE_3 = #{chance3}, CHANCE_4 = #{chance4}, CHANCE_5 = #{chance5}, CHANCE_6 = #{chance6}, TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode} WHERE SEQ = #{teamSeq}
